website_summaries.verdict: This is a good option if you're looking for a solid mid-range robe made from a comfortable cotton material.
pros: Distances itself from competitors with 100% Turkish cotton material that promotes insulation and comfort
cons: This robe tends to shed a bit before the first wash

customer_reviews.title: Lost my wife to this bathrobe
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife, and she now lives in the damn thing. She finds it so comfortable that I cannot remove her from this garment. I don't know when she will come out. Please send help. I am tempted to buy one for myself. She encourages me to do so on a daily basis. I haven't thus far, but I don't know how long I can hold out for.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cotton Robe
customer_reviews.text: Very nice robe. It's like being wrapped in a nice thick towel. It's not "plush" or "fuzzy" and that makes it perfect for me. I've had a string or two but that's to be expected given the material. The weight is just right for me to use from fall to spring and it doesn't weigh so much that I feel burdened by it. I'm 5'3" 125lbs and bought the small/medium and it covers me perfectly. If you're like me and seeking natural fabrics, this is a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Threads catch and pull out easily
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The bathrobe is very comfortable and fits as expected. Normally I wear a S, but got a M to ensure fit through the shoulders, and am glad I did. The sleeves are a bit long and I have long arms. I would rather have this than have them be too short. Cons: It catches and pulls the thread out extremely easily. It says to cut them off right away but I’d be cutting them daily if I did. If you don’t have animals, kids, or construction going on in your home, this might not be as big of an issue. I had my last (cheap) robe for 10 years. I don’t see this one lasting that long.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah McDonald

customer_reviews.title: as described
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a terry robe for right out of the shower that would cover me and feel luxurious as well as practical. I used the reviews to pick this one and I love it. I used the comments to help me find the right size and got a medium/large even though I'm only 5'2" and 120 lbs. I like a roomy robe. It dries so well I don't even have to use a towel after a shower. Plus I love the color, but that's a personal choice. mine (green) was just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Ann Lepoff

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this robe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife as a Christmas gift to replace the thin, fleece one that she had been using. I looked in a few department stores and found nothing nearly as substantial as this robe, and anything that came close was much more than I wanted to spend. I wanted her to have a robe that was like you find at a nice hotel or a spa. She was very excited about this robe. The size is great, the length falls near her knees, however she is about 5'9. She has owned it now about a year and a half and it has kept its color and feel with no problems. I would suggest this robe 100%
customer_reviews.author: Greg B.

customer_reviews.title: Superb Quality and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I don't generally write reviews but this companies customer service warrants one. I ham generally between sizes so I was concerned I would have a problem. Company answered all my questions promptly about shrinkage, sizing, etc.. I have now purchased two styles from them, both are exceptional quality. The shawl bath robe is perfect for winter and the other is both a summery color and lighter material. I hope they expand their line as I love to support a company with high quality AND good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with this
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for in a robe. It's heavy in a good way, warm without being sweaty, has excellent construction, and is beautifully comfortable. The color is kind of a darkish lavender with a strong hint of pink. I'm 5'10", 170, 34C, usually a medium or large, and the M/L comes to about mid-calf and wraps around with a good overlap but without being huge. There is no inner tie, but the inherent friction of terry keeps it from slipping open. I haven't washed it yet, but it's already fairly soft and I expect it will only become more so with time. I'm probably going to live in this thing during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Leeloo

customer_reviews.title: Shrinks when drying even on low.
customer_reviews.text: Even dried on low, the sleeves shrunk quite a bit. I weigh 117 and 5'5" so I ordered the xs/sm. It fit perfectly before washing (as per directions) Two things: the color Alpine Green looks very lush and dark in the photo like a pine green but is actually a brighter, type of green like a jade, which I didn't care for at all. I will try again ordering a sm/med and in a different color and hope I get one like what is shown in the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new robe. I had an old 25 year old robe from Victoria Secret that was practically threadbare and I have never found a robe to replace it. I was looking for something that was thick and absorbent, but not too heavy. I needed a 3⁄4 length so I wouldn’t kill myself on the steps and this robe is EXACTLY what I was looking for. It’s warm without being too hot and the shawl collar makes it cozy.I have already washed it twice and it washes beautifully. I am very pleased with my purchase and thrilled with the price. And I am happy to say that I donated my old VS robe to an animal shelter.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality, Soft and Thirsty
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife, she says it’s like wearing a really soft towel with sleeves. My wife asked me to buy her a Turkish Bathrobe like we had in the resort in Montego Bay Jamaica last year and this is even better. I was a little concerned buying it before touching it but we were pleasantly surprised so we bought another one for me. Very well made, very soft and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: hidden issues
customer_reviews.text: We had the robe just over 60 days in a super dry environment, then noticed some faint black spots on the robe, only wore it a handful of times. tried to wash it out and its still there. didn't wash it with anything. Its Still there it's almost like it's in between layers. Now my wife won't wear it at all, thinking it's some kind of infected mold. Don't know how to get a hold of company. Just buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Super quality and great price -
customer_reviews.text: Did a review already but will do another. This is a wonderfully, thick, fluffy robe. Will be great for chilly mornings/eves and . . . climbing out of the hot tub. Thirsty, high quality terry and the color is exactly as shown. This robe is a genuine bargain for the quality. Very pleased and will recommend to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: sharon collins

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Bath Robe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bath robe for my mother for Christmas. She is very picky, so I was a little nervous buying for her online. After looking at the reviews, I purchased it in the Periwinkle Blue color. What a beautiful color! And my mother loves it!. She has worn it while watching TV in her recliner and can't stop raving about it. Yea!
customer_reviews.author: DAS

customer_reviews.title: One sweet robe!
customer_reviews.text: SWEET! I lost a hotel robe in a move last month, and couldn't be happier. this robe is a great trade up. it is full, thick, and wonderfully comfortable, i could live in it. i bought a lge/xlge, i am 5' 8", the sleeves come down to just below my knuckles, the length is mid calf, the belt is perfectly placed (sometimes i have problems with this) and the collar keeps the drafts out, a little warm for the summer, but it feels so wonderful, who cares! this is an excellent robe, and an excellent buy. i'm glad i had the chance to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Shel

customer_reviews.title: Best robe one can find with good, smooth towel-quality and right price
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered many robes online with some of them quite expensive. But none of them were to my likes. The colors were hideous. The qualities were coarse. This is the best one can find with good , smooth thick towel-like quality, nice color-choices, and most importantly, smooth thick towel-like quality, like the robes we had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Q. Walder

customer_reviews.title: It dries you up quickly.
customer_reviews.text: This is the bathrobe I've been looking for, for a while now. All the department stores in my area all have the soft type, which is too soft for me and it doesn't dry your body. It is a little costly but it's worth it. It is a little heavy, which I like, but what I like the most about it is that it dries me quickly. The material which is 100% Turkish cotton feels like my regular towel that I normally use. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Y. Vilca

customer_reviews.title: Soft, thick, quality terry cloth.
customer_reviews.text: Plush, high quality cotton terrycloth. My wife wears it every evening when we watch TV and she loves the length which keeps her legs warm to the bottom of her calf. This is like a thick spa robe. We looked at a lot of robes and are very pleased with our choice of this one. Worth every penny. Happy wife, happy life.
customer_reviews.author: Hutch

customer_reviews.title: The fabric was literally destroyed after three washes
customer_reviews.text: When this robe arrived and I found it very beautiful. When I started using it, I realized that the fabric was not very absorbent or soft. Once I started washing it -I wash all my clothes with a gentle wash program- the fabric disintegrated literally ... it became a collection of loose threads! The quality of the fabric is very bad. I was extremely disappointed and threw it to the garbage after only some weeks of using it. I would not recommend it at all!
customer_reviews.author: Paloma

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: Plush. That's about the only thing good I can say. A tad on the small size out of the package. Washed it exactly the way the label says in a front loader washer & dryer. Shrunk three inches - at least. The medium/large is now smaller than the small/medium. I expected some shrinkage but this is absolutely ridiculous. The over all quality of the product isn't that great, either. I can already tell that the stitching isn't going to last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color shades are off and looks a bit cheap
customer_reviews.text: This was the second order - first shade said 'forest green' but was more light teal-ish green and wrong size - exchanged for 'deep purple'...also not deep at all but a more brownish purple but it fit so we kept it. It always has loose threads that need to be cut - would not order this robe again for this price!
customer_reviews.author: Enjoynlife

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this robe in XS/S Blue Ashes and am happy with it. I’m 5’6”, 140lbs, 36C. It fits nicely across the shoulders and falls just below my knees. My waist is about 29 in and this size allows the robe to overlap in the front to about my hipbones on both sides. I washed it before wearing and am glad I washed it alone because it shed a lot in both the washer and dryer.
customer_reviews.author: paradise

customer_reviews.title: Great color and fit
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’2 and 140. I ordered the med/lg and the fit is fine. I had to roll the sleeves 2x but that wasn’t a problem. The reason I am only giving it 4 stars is because the reviews said this is a very heavy robe. I have always owned a Landsend and that’s what I would call heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Carpitella

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart after very little wear.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this robe, as a present for my wife, in May. After the first washing it began to fray all over. After less than a year and a only a couple more washings it looks old and ratty. While the robe looks nice when new, it looks terrible after a relatively short time. I would definitely not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ganglare

customer_reviews.title: Color seems off and collects mold when hung to dry.
customer_reviews.text: Pink is much lighter than what is pictured. I understand that you can't necessarily trust what you see on a computer screen, but the difference is pretty substantial. Update: this thing traps water - doesn't dry when hung by the loop, so it grew mold & we had to throw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: This robe is NOT "Turkish Cotton Soft", it is ...
customer_reviews.text: This robe is NOT "Turkish Cotton Soft", it is scratchy and heavy. Also this robe design is early 20th century (100+ years old), why not try ankle length robe so that it is actually warm.
customer_reviews.author: Annmarie Throckmorton

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife's birthday to replace here very threadbare, 20 year old robe. I was concerned that it might be too light weight but it was perfect for her. She is very happy with it and therefore so am I. It appears to be well made with appropriate attention to sewing the seams.
customer_reviews.author: Kedrigern

customer_reviews.title: Nice cotton. Good price. Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: Very. nice. cotton. I expect it's going to wear in and get softer and silkier as it assures. And colors I ordered are good. (I got both the taupe and green, but decided on the green. It's a little darker than my preference, but nicer on me.) I shopped a long time, regardless of price. I'm satisfied. Finally. ; )
customer_reviews.author: fiddleesue

customer_reviews.title: It was adequate. It was a robe for a ...
customer_reviews.text: It was adequate. It was a robe for a guest room so it didn't have to be the top-of-the-line, as if one was going to lounge in it for days on end. I would not order it again, however. I've been spoiled by far more plush and softer robes (that do, in fact, cost quite a bit more.)
customer_reviews.author: Boo Radley

customer_reviews.title: Good robe
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews mostly good and a few bad. The robe arrived a little matted and slightly stiff, but no shedding or falling apart at all. It is very very thick and plush. I threw it in the washer without soap or fabric softener then dried and it came out fluffy and soft. There was a lot of lint in the lint trap but not surprised considering how super thick it is. I like it and didn't notice any shedding or falling apart at all. I got s/m it falls just below my knees. Purple color is pretty and didn't bleed a lot or fade in wash. Will update in a few months after winter wear.
customer_reviews.author: love2shop

customer_reviews.title: Heavyweight, Soft Robe
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a thick, soft cotton robe that would be similar to the robes provided at luxury hotels as an anniversary gift. These robes were exactly what I was looking for! Super soft, and have remained soft and thick after washing and bleaching out a stain. I bought the XS/S for myself (5'6", 130lb) and the S/M for my fiancé (5'11'', 180lb) and they both fit us perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I like it and will keep it but it ripped after the first wash
customer_reviews.text: Its just like a soft towel and great for when stepping out of the shower. It absorbs all the water. Its heavy and seems good quality. Im 5'2 and it hits a little above my ankle. I washed it before using and a belt loop ripped off. Disappointing being the price.It shouldn't rip after ONE wash However I will sew it and keep it because I like it. A lot of lint comes off in the first wash and seems to linger enough to stick to me after a shower. Not too much but a little. Maybe it will be gone the next wash
customer_reviews.author: Donata

customer_reviews.title: Smells
customer_reviews.text: It is just okay. Not as warm or as soft as i would like. The lead color is actually closer to blue than grey. It has an obnoxious perfume smell. i detest the smell of scented detergents and fabric softeners.
customer_reviews.author: M. Price

customer_reviews.title: Shredded!
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased with this robe at first. Loved the weight and feel of the terry, really loved the color. But in less than a year the underarm area started to wear out--maybe from the deodorant that I use. It literally shredded and is no longer wearable. I do put on deodorant after showering, before dressing, while wearing the robe. That's not negotiable. Anyway, it was a short-lived robe, way too short. (in the past I've had terry robes last for years and that's what I would expect)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: My review
customer_reviews.text: This robe is lovely! I was looking for a robe that was mid calf in length with approximately 3/4 length sleeves. This robe fits the bill very well! I also love the color I chose, blush.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Lee Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer than I thought it would be. This replaced a robe that was over a hundred dollars and it was just as good and maybe nicer in some ways. Would absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Norman Blair

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable AND Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I do love this robe even if it seems a bit small. I ordered a Small/Medium. I am 5'2" tall and weigh 115 lbs. I think a person who was larger would find this not generous enough. Other than that, it washes up beautifully, is a rich bright red, wonderfully thick & yummy and well constructed. I can see this lasting me a long time. As a person with allergies, always needing a tissue on hand, I appreciate having pockets on both sides. I look forward to being cozy as winter sets in here in the North!
customer_reviews.author: ZuVuYah

customer_reviews.title: It was also SUPER heavy, but not in a comfy way
customer_reviews.text: This thing was HUGE on me. The shoulders, the arms, everything. It was also SUPER heavy, but not in a comfy way, rather in a "I didn't realize I was lifting weights right now" kind of a way. Not comfortable at all. Material felt like good quality, and the color was nice.
customer_reviews.author: bekki

customer_reviews.title: Great Bathrobe !
customer_reviews.text: The color is "right on". Beautiful blue. This is a bathrobe that's Not lite weight. Which is what I wanted. You have to look at the weight of what you are buying. This is a good solid bathrobe ; it's not going to fall apart. I washed it three times. No strings. It's made really well. This bathrobe will probably be around longer then me. Ha!--Thx. Carol 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Carol S.

customer_reviews.title: I love this robe!
customer_reviews.text: It is so hard to find a terrycloth robe these days, and this one was exactly what I wanted. It is soft and absorbent, and perfect for when I get out of the shower. It has gone through the wash without any issues. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: GingerOhSnap

customer_reviews.title: Order this robe!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bathrobe ! It is very soft! I ordered a small and it fits a little big for my 5'2" frame. I like the terry cloth texture and medium thickness of it which makes washing easy. I read the reviews and had my doubts about the good comments. I decided to go ahead with the purchase anyways and was NOT disappointed. I am so glad I ordered this robe!
customer_reviews.author: diep pham

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great robe. I'm 5'2 so I knew the sleeves were going to run long but after washing and drying I took it to my local seamstress who hemmed them for me. The length come down to mid calf which I also love because I tend to be cold natured sovthis keeps me cozy. My only caution to people interested in This robe is to read the info carefully. This is a VERY heavy robe. It ways you down but the quality and warm outway that one draw back.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Barefield

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, Sheds and falls apart
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this bathrobe. Was excited about the red color but the material sheds all over my furniture and home and after very little laundering the robe has strings hanging out everywhere and continues to shed red fuzz over everything in my home. Poor quality and not anywhere worth the price point. One of the worst purchases I have made on Amazon. Postscript 2/22/14: The company contacted me after I posted my review and replaced the robe with a higher quality one.
customer_reviews.author: KCP

customer_reviews.title: Lovely bathrobe!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift. The recipient seemed to really love it. It runs just a tiny bit on the large side in my opinion, but it is gorgeous and soft and of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bluebell

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the price or the description mislead you, this robe isn't really that soft.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this robe for my wife for her birthday, and while she does use it quite a bit she has made multiple comments on how this robe isn't really that soft. At least not for the price paid for it. Her older robe was like half the price and feels about the same.
customer_reviews.author: zachary barbarin

customer_reviews.title: Thick Turkish robe, not heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice time at a pretty decent price. It is thick and velvety and very absorbent. I'm about 5'1" and the length on me is similar to the model, Mid calf
customer_reviews.author: Doggonefool

customer_reviews.title: Great Robe at a fair price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife, she wanted a soft robe that would keep her warm during the winter. The material is soft and the robe is well made. Very satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: B M

customer_reviews.title: warm and plush.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my fiance, and she said she loves it. She might think I'm compliment fishing so I took off one star. Figure THAT one out Dr Freud...
customer_reviews.author: sondra ernst

customer_reviews.title: Wife absolutely loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: The color is true to what it looks like in the pictures. It was a Christmas gift for my wife and she loves it. Really nice and thick and washes up great. Definitely can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Crum

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE ROBES!
customer_reviews.text: I searched many many listings to find the right cotton terry robes - I was looking for "one size fits all" because was giving to a couple as wedding gift so decided that was best way to go - to err on the too-big size. The robes I received (promptly) were exactly what I hoped for - good quality cotton terry, bright white and well-proportioned - not too big, not too small What a pleasure to get exactly what I wanted. GREAT ROBES! I wish someone would give ME one!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Just a little short width wise, but nice and heavy.
customer_reviews.text: My wife liked the robe and says that it keeps her warm. A good buy and seems to be holding up with the weekly washings.
customer_reviews.author: RKC

customer_reviews.title: Great value & nice material
customer_reviews.text: Great weight for winter time hot tubbing. Material softens up really nice after 1 wash
customer_reviews.author: Dgypsy24

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ROBE
customer_reviews.text: Lovely purple robe size lge/xlge. I'm 110lbs but I sleep wrapped up in these robes winter and summer. Keep me warm in winter and yet don't make me hot in summer. This particular purple robe seems to be the best quality yet with no snagged threads and minimal loose threads. I'll eventually order at least more since I sleep in them. Highly recommended these robes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: So Soft
customer_reviews.text: Nice, thick, an soft !!!!!!! Great robe. Especially for our Wyoming nights and I just want to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: R1SYN

customer_reviews.title: Great Robe, very comfy and warm.
customer_reviews.text: The robe showed up on time and intact. The color and fit were as expected. We bought this kind because it is warm and absorbing unlike fleece that doesn’t help dry you off out of the shower. I would buy this product again and from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Empty

customer_reviews.title: Giant shrinkable robe
customer_reviews.text: When you get this robe in the mail, be prepared, because it is HUGE! However, since I have this problem with virtually every bathrobe (I'm 5'2"), I decided to keep it and see if it would shrink in the dryer. It did. The fabric produced large amounts of dryer lint after the first few washings but that didn't affect the softness or absorbency of the bathrobe. Unlike other white bathrobes at this price point, the material is thick and opaque. For this price, this bathrobe deserves 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: noname

customer_reviews.title: Great Robe
customer_reviews.text: Don't often write reviews but I am particularly pleased with this robe. I am a slender woman, 5'7, 120 lbs. and "one size fits all" has never fit me. I got the XS/S and it's the first terry cloth robe that has ever fit. Very heavy cloth, a bit hot for summer but perfect it cooler weather and getting out of the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen L. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Robe.
customer_reviews.text: I love this robe. It's everything a terry cloth robe should be. Thick, Absorbent, Warm. One thing I noticed was the plethora of ominous warning labels on this robe. I take it that the fabric isn't flame retardant like most fabrics in the US. There are multiple warnings saying STAY AWAY FROM FLAME! I can see how the fluffy terry fabric would catch easy, so I'll just avoid becoming the human torch and stay away from flames.
customer_reviews.author: Ana_Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice robe. Heavy duty well made. This is my second one of these as I use it daily in the spa. Absorbs well and works great if you are wanting it for a pool/hot tub etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift item
customer_reviews.text: The size chart was very helpful in selecting the correct fit. The robe felt “cozy” without being too tight or overly large. The green color was as depicted in the color sample. Delivery was within the promised prime window. Very happy with the quality of the terry material.
customer_reviews.author: Dan L.

customer_reviews.title: A heavy towelly robe.
customer_reviews.text: It is made in Turkey and I am not sure why it is so heavy. It works great if your bathroom or living space is on the cooler side - it will warm you right out of the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Roussina Valkova

customer_reviews.title: expecting a little higher quality for $60 bucks
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels ok but ....... 1st The robe just came in a bag no wrapping or box or anything that looked like I didn't steel it from a Holiday Inn. 2nd Feels a little coarse. maybe it needs to be washed a few times before it softens. 3rd Lots of little stitching threads hanging off some are a different color than the robe I ordered. I ordered a SM/MD White. Would recommend going to Ross or TJ Max and checking there first. You could find something equal or better for $20 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: And her happiness with my gift makes my Alaska cabin warmer
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my bride of 34 years. We live in Alaska and our house is 67 degrees ten months of the year. She loves this robe! And her happiness with my gift makes my Alaska cabin warmer. So I definitely give this Five Stars. (So does Darlene, by the way. I asked her).
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, heavy
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than I expected. But works well lying on my ottoman, so my legs can rest and improve my circulation..
customer_reviews.author: Berta

customer_reviews.title: I love robes. Most of my robes are fuzzy which ...
customer_reviews.text: I love robes. Most of my robes are fuzzy which I love, they aren't ideal for after a bath or shower. This robe is just like a towel and it is fantastic. I don't have to dry off before putting it on, which is great because it allows me to save towels!
customer_reviews.author: Sammi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product. Came home from Hospital-laid the robe over ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Came home from Hospital-laid the robe over a chair- stepped out of shower and into the robe. A wonderful feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Sue Meads

customer_reviews.title: Nice color
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product but it was to long andheavy
customer_reviews.author: Mirian Muino

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but poor material
customer_reviews.text: Robe is comfortable and thick, but it began shedding right away. After wearing it only a couple months, I have dangling threads everywhere on it, and it doesn't look very good (though it's still warm). Not a good purchase for someone who wants their robe to look nice or who has a cat who likes to sit in their lap (their claws will snag, be warned!)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Potter

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious robe
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace my hot tub robe. Need to be 100% cotton for absorbency. This fit the bill! Love it! Color is exactly like photo
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Leer

customer_reviews.title: This was way too big! If you buy it ...
customer_reviews.text: This was way too big! If you buy it go a size smaller. If it fit I would have gave it a 5 star
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thick and warm, but sleeves are too short
customer_reviews.text: I bought the red and it's a great color, great weight, like the texture, and it dries me off adequately when I put it on straight out of the shower (dont even need to use a towel!) However, the sleeves are too short. Not a huge deal, but would have been nice to have long enough sleeves. I usually wear 0 or size 2, usually XS or S, so I ordered the S and the sleeves are an issue. The rest is great though!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Comfy Robe
customer_reviews.text: The sleeves are a little on the short side, but that works for me, since I wear it after my shower while doing my hair & makeup (I'm 5'6", 110 lbs, & got the XS size). The fabric is nice and absorbent, making the robe comfy and warm. I got the "Iron" color, an unusual gray-blue that coordinates nicely with the limestone in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: LVinLA

customer_reviews.title: Robe
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy with it. I washed it once before I wore it so to be sure it was clean and it is not at all soft or comfortable as I expected. I would never order from this company again I regret that I cannot return it because I washed it Mary Browder
customer_reviews.author: Mary Elizabeth Browder

customer_reviews.title: Changed original review from “Fabulous” to “Frumpy”
customer_reviews.text: Edited review. After several washings I can say that if you looked up the word “Frumpy” online you would see a picture of me wearing this robe.
customer_reviews.author: Zoo Lady

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. It feels great but just a bit bigger than rxpected.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a robe that was large enough to completely cover me and keep me warm. This does that. It is heavy, which I love. The aqua color is perfect. Exactly what I was looking for. I'm ready for next winter, and will probably never need another style of robe....just maybe a second color.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Rehage

customer_reviews.title: I love this robe
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit concerned about the size after reading some reviews because they said it may be small for a big guy. Well, I need not worry because there was lot of room in the XL for a 6' 240# guy. The feel is wonderful and I especially love wearing it now that the weather is a bit cool. I use it to lounge around the house and it keeps me warm and comfortable. I was also comfortable when the weather was warmer. I have had it for about 2 months now and I love this robe.
customer_reviews.author: The Saint

customer_reviews.title: feels good
customer_reviews.text: this robe is just what I wanted, I'm very happy that their description was dead on.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Kent

customer_reviews.title: Quality, warmth, worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as aChristmas gift and the recipient was MORE than thrilled. More spendy than some, but the quality is top of the line. I will buy this again - for the next one that asks for a high quality robe - maybe myself?!
customer_reviews.author: Mothershopper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful robe
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful robe. The name"Rain" is perfect for the color: a toss between a sage green and a light aqua. The fit is good, like the models in the pictures. The robe is warm and comfortable. Only reason not to give it 5 stars is that the weight of the terry is not as thick and plush as I had hoped. It is more of a medium weight terry. That is a minor complaint as the robe does meet all other specifications.
customer_reviews.author: Carol G

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Not 5 stars yet because I've only had it a couple weeks and washed once, but so far it's just what I wanted. It is soft, thick and absorbent, which it just what I wanted to have when stepping out of the shower. It was replacing one that I had for 20+ years, so we'll have to see how this one holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Corinna Applegate

customer_reviews.title: Egyptian Cotton Bathrobe
customer_reviews.text: This robe is very large I am 5'3" weight 168 the sleeves go way past my hands the waist with belt loops hits me halfway down my hips the length hits the top of my feet. I ordered size XX large. This is a good quality robe if you are taller than I am it would be great. It is very heavy. The pink is a beautiful shade. I have never returned anything but I am going to return the robe.
customer_reviews.author: Mae West

customer_reviews.title: My parents bought me a medium sized robe like this two years ago and it has always been ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little bit nervous to purchase this because I’m right between a small and a medium size. My parents bought me a medium sized robe like this two years ago and it has always been way too big. When I finally decided to get a new one, I went for the small/extra small size instead and it fits perfectly! Couldn’t be happier. Also? It’s so cushy and soft!
customer_reviews.author: Alyson Needham

customer_reviews.title: My first robe
customer_reviews.text: I have toyed with the idea of picking up a robe for years. With a lot of mixed reviews online, and very few places to try one on in person, I'd always pushed it off. I bit the bullet and picked this up. At 5 foot 8, and 155 lbs, the small/medium fits very well. It's thick, warm, and heavy. My only complaint about the robe at all is that there seems to be a lot of loose thread/stitching. I've washed it a few times, and it seems to hold up well to washing.
customer_reviews.author: Sean T. Zorio

customer_reviews.title: My wife wears it so it must be comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife (who is very picky) because she didn't like the last one I got her. My wife is 5'5" and about 150lbs so I got the L/XL thinking it would hang close to the ground (which is what she wants) but she said it felt a bit big and only reaches her knees. Oh well, she must like it because I see her wearing it all the time now. The material is high quality and I would recommend this and might buy one for me in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Kona Sean

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Robe - exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this robe for my husband who is recovering from surgery. He was more interested in something warm rather than absorbent. This robe is fantastic! It's heavy, warm, and though we haven't tested the andorbency yet, I have no doubt that it will be exceptional as well. It's incredibly well made and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a robe of quality and substance!
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Becker

customer_reviews.title: Great material
customer_reviews.text: If you like a nice roomy bathrobe, order a size bigger, but it’s nice and heavy, I’m just sorry I didn’t order a bigger size
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: I like this bathrobe
customer_reviews.text: I like this bathrobe.It is thick and good quality cotton. I ordered the coral-pink and it has an undefined color, does not look like clear pink or like coral.Looks more like salmon. So i am not crazy about its color. But i ordered a medium and it is a little large but i like it that way.It covers everything and it is very warm.
customer_reviews.author: nicolero

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I can honestly say, this is my favorite robe ever. Not too thick or too thin. Perfect. I purchased size S/M. 5'7. 138lbs.
customer_reviews.author: pita7317

customer_reviews.title: The quality was great and I loved the color but it was too ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality was great and I loved the color but it was too heavy and bulky for my small frame. I'm 5'3 and felt like a big bear! The collar was really heavy around my neck and pulled on my shoulders but I gave it a 5 star because it would be great on someone with a larger frame.
customer_reviews.author: nana1016

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and warm robe
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this robe and I no longer freeze when I get out of the shower and no longer need my bath towels. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: nancy a

customer_reviews.title: very warm robe
customer_reviews.text: The robe has been too heavy and warm for me to use and we live in Wisconsin.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Pansy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted - a big, warm, cozy robe!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Just Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was on a quest to find the perfect bathrobe and I just found it (after wasting my money on 3 others)! Yes it is that good. I usually tumble dry it with some "fluffing spiky balls" and the robe ends up soft warm and fluffy. This is real nice quality. I will reorder a backup soon.
customer_reviews.author: ChristelleV

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for me as a gift. He read the reviews and ordered the L/XL because I am 6' tall. The robe fits my height but I could fit two of me inside it. The extra room isn't terrible but the thing is so heavy- 4lbs to be exact. The thing pulls my shoulders down and it just gets uncomfortable after a while. I gave it three stars only because it is super soft and warm and the cotton seems like it will last a while. I wish it came in more sizes because this is really more like an XL and I would prefer a L.
customer_reviews.author: Zulu Wookie

customer_reviews.title: Big at first, but upon washing&drying shrank to perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'3, wear a size L or a size 10~12. I got a size M/L upon seeing some comments about shrinkage. At first when I took it out of the bag, the sleeves went past my hands and the robe was down by my ankles so I was not happy...but upon washing and drying it I saw that it shrank to the perfect size. Just make sure to not wash it with other clothes because it gets very linty.
customer_reviews.author: MojoKojo

customer_reviews.title: Wife
customer_reviews.text: soft and nice to put on after a bath or shower.
customer_reviews.author: Lisbeth Harris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality! So soft and cozy
customer_reviews.text: Loooooove it! Excellent quality! So soft and cozy! I am so so happy with this item. I had bought a deluxe one from Bed Bath & Beyond, and it left fuzz on my skin each time and I was upset because it was expensive. I had a hard time finding a good bath robe. So when I ordered this, I thought I would be left disappointed again but thank goodness it didn't. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: FRED DILO

customer_reviews.title: but still a nice, warm robe to snuggle in after a bath ...
customer_reviews.text: A little longer than I expected and a bit heavy for my taste, but still a nice, warm robe to snuggle in after a bath or shower.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy H.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my girlfriend after a great deal of research; she's told me numerous times that it is the best bathrobe she's ever had. We did make a point to wash it separately the first time to make sure that the colors didn't bleed, but I noticed nothing in the water, so that may not be an issue even for the red and maroon versions. The fit was just right; this is a solid purchase, and feels in every respect like a very high quality robe.
customer_reviews.author: Zac Henderson

customer_reviews.title: AWSOME robes!!! Very heavy just what we need for in the mountains on cold mornings and evenings.
customer_reviews.text: Order the next size if you like roomy robes or sometimes wear them over something as they seem to run a little small. Thanks for stocking a high quality product almost impossible to find!
customer_reviews.author: Valentina
